text: @JoeBiden But your #BadCoronavirusScience *IS* essentially fiction! #COVID19IsNOTADeadlyVirus and there was NO justifiable reason for your #Lockdowns - which actually *increased* deaths associated with #COVID19. #DumpTheDems #BuildAWorkersParty #FightForASocialistFuture
